title: How to Install a Venturi Clip
description: A Venturi Clip is designed to help stabilize a grill’s burner and ensure it is aligned and stays aligned properly. Learn how to install one on your gas grill.

asset.title: How to Install a Venturi Clip
asset.description: A Venturi Clip is designed to help stabilize a grill’s burner and ensure it is aligned and stays aligned properly. Learn how to install one on your gas grill.
asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: A venturi clip is designed to help stabilize a grill’s burner and insure it is aligned and stays aligned properly. There are different types of Venturi Clips designed for a specific grill model but each performs the same function and follows a similar installation path. To install a Venturi clip, select the small hole on the bottom of the burner tube, insert the hook end of the clip into the hole. The other end snaps around the gas manifold or valve body. The venturi clip should fit snugly in place.
